name: Stealth Princess
description:
Play as the princess of a castle.

Attempt to sneak out of your over protective fathers safeguard, to see your unapproved beau Sir Rougesalot!

Sneak past guards by throwing an unending supply of glass slippers to distract them.

Many minutes of first person sneak em up action!! 

Developed as a 5 week student project for AIE Adelaide

Art, Design and Code by : Morgan Davies

Glass slipper Model by: Shakur Muller
